QuestData.Title: Vile Like Fire!
QuestData.Description: Vile like fire! Vile like proto-drakes!$B$B<The abomination claps its hands excitedly.>$B$BLittle $n go to Jotunheim and steal a pretty proto-drake in Njorndar Village. Make proto-drake make pretty fires on Jotunheim buildings!
QuestData.LogDescription: Vile at The Shadow Vault wants you to steal a Njorndar Proto-Drake and use it to set fire to 8 vrykul buildings in the greater Jotunheim region.$B$BBalargarde Fortress, due to its nature, cannot be set ablaze.
QuestData.CompletionText: What? Vile not see lots of fire!!!$B$B$n go back and make more fire!
QuestData.RewardText: Yay, yay! $N is best proto-drake stealer.$B$BYou come back tomorrow and we make more fire!!!
